content.description:
Violence Prayers is a complete problem, the holds are varied, and the landing is great.

Sit start with left and right hand sidepulls.  From there, stick a left hand crimp, bump the right hand up to the horizontal rail, traverse left through the pinch and sidepull, gain the big rail, and stand up tall to the jug at the lip and top it out.
content.protection: A few pads, but the landing is great here.
content.location: This is on the South face of Dermal Death Boulder.

content.description:
One Stop Punk climbs a short, slightly overhung face via edges and one really fun move.

Sit start with hands on the horizontal rail and thin feet. From there, stand up to a right hand edge, then make a big move (fun!) to a left hand sloper-jug, match hands, and finish straight up for the topout.
content.protection: A pad or two will suffice. The landing is very good, but there is a rock just right of where the problem climbs.
content.location: It climbs just right of Loma Coma on the south face of Dermal Death.

content.description:
Sit start with hands matched on the arête.  From there, move up the arête using a tough pinch, then reach the good sidepulls and eventual jug at the lip for the topout.

This starts out hard and eases up as you climb.  Be cognizant of the jug at the lip, as the soundness of it is suspect.
content.protection: A pad or two, the landing is great though.
content.location: This ascends the Southwest arête of Dermal Death Boulder.

content.description: Sit start with hands matched at the large hueco.  From there, traverse right through a series of sidepulls and crimps. Once at the large crimp rail, head straight up and top it out.
content.protection: A few pads will do, the landing is very good though.
content.location: This ascends the south face of Dermal Death.

content.description:
The Bondage of Debt climbs through a large hueco and edges via interesting movement.

Sit start with hands matched on the right side of the large hueco. From there, edge the left foot into the hueco, knee-bar, reach the two, good-sized underclings, then make a big move straight up to a crimp rail, match, and continue up to the jugs and the topout.
content.protection: A pad or two will work fine, the landing is really good.
content.location: It climbs the center, south face of Dermal Death.

content.description:
Sit start with hands matched on the big hueco.  From there, work out right to a pair of opposing sidepulls, hit the horizontal rail, stand up tall to the lip's jug, and top it out.

The trick to this one is starting with a left heel and never letting go until reaching the horizontal rail.
content.protection: A few pads, but the landing is primo.
content.location: It is on the South face of Dermal Death Boulder.

content.description:
Sit start with hands matched on the vertical flake.  From there, continue up the flake to the horizontal rail, make a big move to the lip, and top it out.

Part of the intial flake is suspect, but it should be just fine as long as you don't completely load it.
content.protection: A pad or two, the landing is really good.
content.location: This is the easternmost problem on the south face of Dermal Death Boulder.
